5. Would you describe the day of the month as a nominal, ordinal, interval, or ratio number? Explain your reasoning.

> Answer: The day of the month is interval data because it has meaningful and equal intervals (for example, the difference between day 5 and day 10 is 5 days) and does not have a true absolute zero.
